sentences.en: " Turn at nightfall toward the western valley , where I watch the south star over the mountain "
sentences.cn: 际夜转西 壑, 隔山望南斗.

sentences.en: At nightfall the bells would toll 108 times.
sentences.cn: 每到黄昏时分,钟鸣一百零八响.

sentences.en: At nightfall, he returned to the rickshaw yard dead - beat and preoccupied.
sentences.cn: 晚上, 他回到车厂,身上已极疲乏,但是还不肯忘了这件事.

sentences.en: Don’t worry, we’ll be back by nightfall.
sentences.cn: 别担心，我们傍晚之前会回来的。

sentences.en: I need to get to Lyon by nightfall.
sentences.cn: 我需要在黄昏前到达里昂。

sentences.en: I started work at dawn and returned only at nightfall.
Let's push on it's nearly nightfall.
sentences.cn: 咱们继续往前走吧--天快黑了.

sentences.en: She always searched for her fellows at nightfall, to have the protection of their companion - ship homeward.
sentences.cn: 一到天黑,她总是找她同去的人,和她们结伴而行, 以便在回家的路上得到保护.

sentences.en: The company was not attempting to run cars after nightfall.
sentences.cn: 公司天黑之后就不再出车.

sentences.en: The young couple are often seen walking along the beach at nightfall.
sentences.cn: 人们常常看到那对年轻夫妇在傍晚沿着海滩散步.

sentences.en: They were trying to make New Orleans by nightfall.
sentences.cn: 他们力图在黄昏前赶到新奥尔良。

sentences.en: Toward nightfall the sky darkened over Puerto Rico.
sentences.cn: 将近黄昏的时候,波多黎各上空阴云密布.

sentences.en: We had been held since nightfall.
sentences.cn: 从黄昏以来,我们就遭到监视.

sentences.en: With any luck, we'll find him by nightfall or in the morning.
sentences.cn: 如果运气好, 我们黄昏,要不就在黎明就能找到那家伙.

sentences.en: You must try and get to the town before nightfall.
sentences.cn: 今晚上你要赶到双桥镇!

trans.tran_en: the time when it begins to get dark in the evening
